div.p: This URL should be the full URL to the image, example: https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4099/4822349222_4b4b990726_z.jpg

If you would like to add an information source (e.g. an archival document, a published document, an ethnographic citation), then simply click New Source and add the citation information. Sources can be added as a text citation or as a link to a source in the existing bibliography. To link to an existing source please use the "Find source" button.
